summary: Sylgja adjusted to wear the Tavern Wench outfit
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=RED]Sylgja Tavern Wench Outfitted[/COLOR]
============================

[COLOR=YELLOW]NEW VERSION ADDED - V2.0 - Improved greatly and now just an .esp file![/COLOR]

------------------------------------------
Here is my adjustment of \'Sylgja\' - an NPC you can marry from Shor\'s Stone.

------------------------------------------

I wasn\'t too keen on her miners outfit, so I have swapped it out for the popular Tavern Wench
outfit instead. Now those who marry her can have a slightly more respectable wife ;)

I have also removed her pickaxe, as it didn\'t fit very well with the Tavern Wench Clothing!

[COLOR=RED]NOTE:[/COLOR] I have a few clothing and appearance mods installed, so your character may differ slighty in appearance from my image. 

You will still have Sylgja wearing the Tavern Wench Outfit, and pickaxe removed

[COLOR=RED]Sylgja Fine Clothes Option Added[/COLOR]

Kind regards
Mike

Here\'s a list of mods I have installed that affect the characters appearance.
This is for those that asked when looking at my image what I had used at the time.

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* AOF Believable Hair[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4307

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* Better Females by Bella Version 3[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* Caliente Female Body Mod Slim Body Edition[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* Caliente Body Feet and Hands Slim[/COLOR]
As above (same link)

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* Improved NPC Clothing[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2674

[COLOR=Cornflowerblue]* SKYRIM ENHANCED SHADERS FX Beta 10i PureENB[/COLOR]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4463

Credit goes to the original authors of the above mods.

===============
MY MODS SO FAR
===============
